text:
[Verse]
Woke up this morning light so bright
Sunshine in my pocket feels so right
Dancing shadows play around me
Feeling free just you and me

[Verse 2]
No clouds to block a perfect day
Golden rays just lead the way
Rhythm in my feet can't stop now
Heart beats like a drum loud and proud

[Chorus]
Sunshine in my pocket all day long
Feel the vibe it's our happy song
Glowing bright like sparkles in the sky
Spread our wings and let’s just fly

[Verse 3]
Rainbow colors paint the town
Smiles all around never a frown
Catch the moment hold it tight
In this sunlight day and night

[Bridge]
Let the warmth just take you higher
Burning bright with pure desire
Laugh and sing let worries fade
In this sunshine we have it made

[Chorus]
Sunshine in my pocket all day long
Feel the vibe it's our happy song
Glowing bright like sparkles in the sky
Spread our wings and let’s just fly
title: Sunshine in My Pocket
